title: Anyone interested in forming a pop band from India? Please mention your age and contact details. - Quora

response.answer_text: It's very exciting to know people are interested and have same idea as mine. I will be creating an insta account for this and will post the link here please keep in touch and also share with your frnds who ever will be interested in this venture of ours.
Hii!! I am way too interested in forming a band. My name is Bhadra Viswanath and I am 15 years old. Can I please know more about you and your plans. Thanks by the way.
Realy, I am interested Name -sonia rawat Read- 9 th grade Age - 15 I do my 100 percent best for this If you want to contact me this my personal number just message me 7982845314
Yes, I'm also very interested in it , I'm 16 and I'll be glad if i get any chance, if need more information just let me know. Thanks.
